pullRequest.body:
The results in this file were unrelated (and had disjoint import requirements!) so I've separated them.

The doc-string was badly out of date before I came along, so I've replaced it.

  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10670448604/job/29574472389)

I think you renamed this from `FiniteDimensional.Subalgebra.isSimpleOrder_of_finrank_prime`
I'm pretty sure that was a mistake? I didn't add a deprecation as it is unused in Mathlib.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore: split FieldTheory/Tower
